title: OS Level 7 — Deadlocks
intro: This level covers deadlock concepts, conditions, handling methods and basic algorithms.
points: Define deadlock and recognize situations where it can occur.
Know the four Coffman conditions for deadlock: mutual exclusion, hold and wait, no preemption, circular wait.
Basic approaches: deadlock prevention, avoidance, detection and recovery.
Understand the idea of safe and unsafe states in deadlock avoidance.
Conceptual overview of Banker’s algorithm (no need to memorize full implementation at this level).
